entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
